FrOSCon 2015 Lecture: A Solution to the Backup Inconvenience

12 Sep 2015

For the tenth time, FrOSCon took place at the University of Applied Sciences Bonn-Rhein-Sieg in Sankt Augustin near Bonn/Cologne on 22nd and 23rd of August. We took the chance and submitted a talk about restic titled “A Solution to the Backup Inconvenience”, which was accepted.

You can watch the recording and view the slides. If you do so, please leave feedback

The recording is embedded below:
